content.body: Help wanted / Good first issue: For anybody interested in contributing to the HTML standard, https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/1102 might be a good issue you could resolve, by writing a spec patch for it with a modest amount of effort — perhaps mostly by just porting over the existing `<input capture>` spec text from https://w3c.github.io/html-media-capture/
